posts.title: i am still gonna make it

content.content: i am writing this to let my thoughts out and to get better at writing as well

i have spent my 3 semesters of my clg only making games, i started at during sem 2. i learned about game dev process, made many games some of have them not seen the light out of my unity folder. from sem 2 to sem 4, i was making and learning about games only with no particular direction where i was going.

i didn't cared about what will i get from doing all this. never felt FOMO. then during sem 4 something hit me, i realised i always wanted to make games, from childhood i always thought about how can i make something like this (games i played earlier). then after some thoughts i decided if i want to make games without myself burning out, i wanted peace.

to get peace i needed money type shi, game industry is tough to break into. the pay is peanuts for new game dev tho there might be some exceptions. so i decided not to pursue game dev as a career but as indie dev. so finally i came back to why i joined engg clg, to make big fuckin cash hahaha; tho nowadays i love learning more about computers, thx ludwig. so during the sem 4 only i tried all of shit i could tried from devops to web dev slop to backend stuff nowadays.

i was late to exploring stuff while my 2nd year was getting completed. then i joined x dot com, made many new frens here :), seeing them making good progress in their career makes me left out. like what the fuck where did i go wrong, mf u spent 3 sem making games lamao. everywhere i go i see ppl getting internships while i am here still learning or building projects. man when will i get internship lamao i should stop crying and apply and cold dm more

even tho i am late i am still gonna fucking make it, im gonna be great swe or builder. im gonna consume my idols - ludwig, kyon, tdm. once i start making money im gonna start doing my bit again, my second bit requires a lot of money, tho im still gonna make it
if u are still reading thank you, u can dm me about how good was my writing or anything else u want to talk about
one last thing i want to say - even tho i am late, i am still gonna make it and
